title: OS X 10.8 Final Mountain Lion (VMware image) - Pt-BR
description:
This pack include:
* VMware Unlocker 
* OS X 10.8 (Retail) image for VMware.


REQUERIMENTS:
- VMware 8.0 Workstation or VMware 7.1


INSTALATION:

1 - Unzip the files with 7-zip or WinRAR, PASSWORD: tecportal 

2 - Foremost, run the patch (VMware unlocke). This unlocker utility replaces few VMware program files, so it can install and run latest 10.8 Mountain Lion and OS X guests.

3 - Now you can run the virtual Machine.

4 - The next step you configure the user preferences and country.


Enjoy!

---------------------------
